item.title: 印度财政部长表示，尽管美国征收关税，印度仍将继续购买俄罗斯石油
item.description: 印度财政部长周五表示，尽管特朗普政府决定对印度商品征收高额进口关税，但印度将继续购买俄罗斯石油，因为事实证明这很经济。【原文：India will continue to buy Russian oil as it proves economical, its finance minister said on Friday, despite the Trump administration's decision to impose heavy import tariffs on Indian goods due, in part, to its energy purchases from Moscow.】

item.title: 即时观点：美国 8 月就业增长大幅放缓，失业率攀升
item.description: 8 月份美国就业增长速度的放缓幅度超过预期，失业率上升，表明劳动力市场状况出现放缓迹象，并增强了美联储需要更加积极地降息的预期。【原文：The pace of U.S. job growth slowed more than expected in August, and the unemployment rate increased, pointing to signs of slowing labor market conditions and boosting expectations the Federal Reserve will need to be more aggressive in cutting interest rates.】

item.title: 美国 8 月份就业增长大幅减弱；失业率升至 4.3
item.description: 8 月份，美国就业增长急剧减弱，失业率上升至 4.3%，证实劳动力市场状况正在走软，为美联储本月降息奠定了基础。【原文：U.S. job growth weakened sharply in August while the unemployment rate increased to 4.3%, confirming that labor market conditions were softening and sealing the case for an interest rate cut from the Federal Reserve this month.】

item.title: 受降息预期影响，全球股票基金流入量猛增
item.description: 截至9月3日，全球股票基金创下三周以来最大单周流入量，原因是市场对美联储本月降息的预期不断增强，以及Alphabet获得有利的反垄断裁决提振了市场情绪。【原文：Global equity funds drew their biggest weekly inflows in three weeks in the period to September 3, lifted by growing expectations of a Federal Reserve rate cut this month and a favorable antitrust ruling for Alphabet that buoyed sentiment.】

item.title: 卢特尼克表示，尽管法律战仍在继续，但大型贸易协定将继续存在
item.description: 美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）周五在接受CNBC采访时表示，尽管美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的全面关税正在受到法律挑战，但他的贸易协议仍将保持不变。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's trade deals will stay in place despite an ongoing legal challenge to his sweeping tariffs, U.S. Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick told CNBC in an interview on Friday.】

item.title: VIEW 特斯拉董事会建议为马斯克提供创纪录的 1 万亿美元方案
item.description: 特斯拉董事会为首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）提出了一项史无前例的 1 万亿美元的薪酬计划，使马斯克在这家电动汽车制造商寻求进军机器人轴和仿人机器人领域时的掌控力成为焦点。【原文：Tesla's board has proposed an unprecedented $1 trillion compensation plan for CEO Elon Musk, putting the spotlight on Musk's hold on the electric-vehicle maker as it looks to pivot into robotaxis and humanoid robots.】

item.title: 特朗普加密货币支持者贾斯汀-孙（Justin Sun）称其世界自由代币被冻结
item.description: 孙正义是美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的世界自由金融公司（World Liberty Financial）加密企业的最大支持者之一，他在周五表示，他的代币已被冻结，但没有透露更多细节。【原文：Justin Sun, one of the biggest known backers of President Donald Trump's World Liberty Financial crypto venture, said on Friday that his tokens had been frozen, without giving further details.】

item.title: 高通公司与宝马公司推出自动驾驶系统，以更好地参与日益增长的市场竞争
item.description: 美国芯片公司高通公司（Qualcomm）和德国豪华汽车制造商宝马公司（BMW）周五宣布推出自动驾驶系统，该系统可通过免提辅助驾驶等新功能吸引客户。【原文：U.S. chip company Qualcomm and German luxury automaker BMW announced an automated driving system on Friday, which could help attract customers with new features like hands-free driving assistance.】

item.title: 中国人工智能初创公司智璞为克劳德人工智能用户提供向其自身模式迁移的计划
item.description: 据报道，Anthropic将禁止中资实体使用其人工智能服务，中国人工智能初创公司智璞科技（Zhipu）周五表示，将帮助Anthropic的Claude人工智能服务用户迁移到自己的GLM-4.5模型。【原文：Chinese AI startup Zhipu said on Friday it will help users of Anthropic's Claude AI services migrate to its own GLM-4.5 model, following a report that Anthropic will bar Chinese-run entities from using its AI services.】

item.title: 能源部长表示，欧盟将欢迎美国支持退出俄罗斯石油市场
item.description: 欧盟能源专员丹-约根森（Dan Jorgensen）周五告诉路透社，欧盟将欢迎美国总统唐纳德-特朗普支持欧盟停止购买俄罗斯石油的计划，因为购买俄罗斯石油有助于为莫斯科在乌克兰的战争提供资金。【原文：The European Union would welcome U.S. President Donald Trump's support for its plans to stop buying Russian oil, purchases of which are helping to finance Moscow's war in Ukraine, EU Energy Commissioner Dan Jorgensen told Reuters on Friday.】

item.title: 美国 放眼就业
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 特斯拉将奖励马斯克 1 万亿美元，前提是公司实现一些崇高目标
item.description: 特斯拉董事会为首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）提出了一项新的薪酬计划，在实现某些崇高目标后，该计划的价值约为 1 万亿美元。【原文：Tesla's board has proposed a new compensation plan for CEO Elon Musk valued at about $1 trillion upon achieving certain lofty targets.】

item.title: 消息人士称，由于数据不足和投诉不断，印度监管机构加强了对简街的调查
item.description: 两位直接了解此事的消息人士称，由于市场参与者不断投诉，印度市场监管机构对简街公司的交易行为展开了正式调查，尽管其监督部门曾提出过相反的建议。【原文：India's markets regulator launched a formal investigation into Jane Street's trading practices even though its surveillance department had recommended otherwise, due to continued complaints from market participants, two sources with direct knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 标准普尔 500 指数期货在薪资数据公布前创下历史新高；博通大涨
item.description: 在周五关键的非农就业数据公布前，与 S&P 500 指数挂钩的期货触及纪录高位，纳斯达克指数期货上扬，芯片巨头博通公司（Broadcom）的季度收益也增加了涨幅。【原文：Futures tied to the S&P 500 touched record highs and Nasdaq futures edged upward ahead of key nonfarm payrolls data on Friday, with chip major Broadcom's quarterly earnings adding to gains.】

item.title: 华尔街一周前瞻 通胀数据牵动市场走势，股市徘徊在历史最高水平
item.description: 未来一周，美国股市投资者将面临一系列通胀数据，同时市场还要应对关税和政府债券收益率带来的新的不确定性，而股市则在高估值上徘徊。【原文：A spate of inflation data confronts U.S. stock investors in the coming week as markets grapple with fresh uncertainty over tariffs and government bond yields, while equities hover at lofty valuations.】

item.title: 美国服装零售商测试全价策略，富裕购物者持续消费
item.description: 包括李维斯（Levi's）和 Aritzia 在内的一些服装零售商正在预告将推出更多全价产品，以测试尽管关税的影响令人担忧，但富裕的购物者愿意支付多少钱。【原文：A handful of apparel retailers including Levi's and Aritzia are teasing more full-priced products, testing how much wealthier shoppers are willing to pay despite the sobering effect of tariffs.】

item.title: 公司称 TikTok 欧洲用户突破 2 亿
item.description: 短视频应用平台 TikTok 周五表示，TikTok 在欧洲拥有超过 2 亿月活用户，大约每三个欧洲人中就有一个是 TikTok 的用户，这是 TikTok 在青少年中迅速发展的最新迹象。【原文：TikTok has more than 200 million monthly users in Europe, or roughly one in three citizens on the continent, the short video app platform said on Friday, the latest sign of its rapid growth among teenagers.】

item.title: 博通股价因新人工智能协议和首席执行官的保证而上涨
item.description: 博通公司（Broadcom）股价在周五的盘前交易中大涨 7%，原因是该公司对人工智能收入的乐观展望以及首席执行官谭浩克（Hock Tan）承诺继续留任五年，这让押注该芯片制造商定制硅战略的投资者感到放心。【原文：Broadcom shares jumped 7% in premarket trading on Friday, as an upbeat outlook for artificial intelligence revenue and CEO Hock Tan's pledge to stay on for five more years reassured investors betting on the chipmaker's custom silicon strategy.】

item.title: 蒂森克虏伯钢铁公司工人批准重组计划，等待融资
item.description: 蒂森克虏伯欧洲钢铁公司（tkSE）的工人投票通过了一项全面的重组计划，为这家德国最大的钢铁制造商的复兴奠定了基础，但这取决于蒂森克虏伯股份公司是否承诺为该计划提供资金。【原文：Workers at Thyssenkrupp Steel Europe (tkSE) voted to approve a sweeping restructuring plan, setting the stage for the revival of Germany's largest steelmaker, contingent on Thyssenkrupp AG's commitment to finance the initiative.】

item.title: 美国需求疲软和关税问题导致 Lululemon 股价下跌
item.description: 受美国需求不振和关税成本影响，运动服装制造商 Lululemon Athletica 下调了年度利润和销售预期，周五该公司股价在盘前交易中暴跌超过 17%。【原文：Shares of Lululemon Athletica plunged more than 17% in premarket trading on Friday after the athletic wear maker slashed annual profit and sales forecasts, hurt by tepid U.S. demand and tariff costs.】

item.title: 消息人士称，ByteDance 芯片设计员工突然发现他们要向新加坡部门汇报工作
item.description: 中国科技巨头字节跳动公司（ByteDance）的许多芯片设计人员都在北京或上海工作，他们上周意外地发现自己隶属于新加坡的一个部门。【原文：Chip design workers at Chinese tech giant ByteDance, many based in Beijing or Shanghai, unexpectedly found out last week that they are part of a Singapore unit, three people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 中国创纪录的 3220 亿美元股票押注贷款助长波动并引发警惕
item.description: 今年，中国投资者借入了创纪录的 3,220 亿美元购买股票，但本周的大幅调整以及监管部门为冷却过热市场而加强的审查，正使他们对这种杠杆赌注感到不安。【原文：China's investors borrowed a record $322 billion to buy stocks this year, but sharp corrections this week and heightened regulatory scrutiny to cool overheated markets are now making them jittery about the leveraged bets.】

item.title: 美国关税仍是日本小型汽车制造商的一大痛点
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普削减了美国对日本汽车征收的高额关税，这给日本汽车制造商带来了一些宽慰，但减税仍意味着日本小型汽车公司将承受巨大的痛苦，它们将在这个至关重要的市场上继续承受压力。【原文：President Donald Trump gave Japanese automakers some relief by cutting his high U.S. tariffs on their vehicles, but the reduced levies still mean big pain for Japan's smaller car companies, which will stay under pressure in the crucial market.】

item.title: 空中客车公司 1-8 月交付量下降 3
item.description: 空中客车公司周五表示，8月份交付了61架飞机，使今年前8个月的飞机交付量达到434架，比去年同期下降了3%，证实了路透社的报道。【原文：Airbus delivered 61 aircraft in August, bringing deliveries for the first eight months of the year to 434 jets, down 3% from the same period last year, the planemaker said on Friday, confirming a Reuters report.】

item.title: 雀巢公司首席执行官的调整掩盖了更广泛的颓势
item.description: 瑞士食品巨头雀巢公司（Nestle）因首席执行官突然下台而陷入困境，投资者和分析师敦促它在严峻的消费市场中瘦身。【原文：Swiss food giant Nestle , roiled by the sudden ouster of its CEO, faces a stern challenge with investors and analysts urging it to slim down in a tough consumer market as rivals cut costs and even break up to improve their performance.】

item.title: 美国贸易休战提振作用减弱，中国 8 月出口增长放缓
item.description: 中国的出口增长在 8 月份可能有所放缓，原因是中国政府与第一大消费市场达成的关税休战协议所带来的暂时提振作用逐渐减弱，从而拖累了对美国的出口。【原文：China's export growth probably slowed in August, weighed down by weaker shipments to the U.S. as a temporary boost from Beijing's tariff truce with its top consumer market fades.】

item.title: 慕尼黑车展上中国品牌云集，"这是欧洲与中国的较量
item.description: 中国和欧洲的汽车制造商将在下周的慕尼黑车展上一决高下，这反映出欧洲大陆的竞争正在加剧，大众汽车等老牌汽车制造商与电动汽车巨头比亚迪以及新晋汽车制造商广汽集团和长安汽车之间的竞争日趋激烈。【原文：Chinese and European carmakers are set to face off at next week's Munich car show, reflecting intensifying competition on the continent that has pitted incumbents such as Volkswagen against EV giant BYD and newcomers GAC and Changan.】

item.title: Revolut 聘用法国兴业银行前老板欧迪亚担任西欧主席
item.description: 总部位于伦敦的金融科技公司 Revolut 已聘请法国兴业银行前首席执行官 Frederic Oudea 担任其位于巴黎的西欧中心主席，准备申请该国的银行牌照。【原文：London-based financial technology company Revolut has hired Frederic Oudea, the former CEO of France's Societe Generale, as chairman of its Western Europe hub in Paris, as it prepares to apply for a banking licence in the country.】

item.title: 美日声明显示，日本探索购买阿拉斯加液化天然气，作为 70 亿美元能源交易的一部分
item.description: 周五，一份关于双边贸易协议的联合声明显示，日本已确认承诺每年从美国购买价值 70 亿美元的能源，同时探讨双方新的阿拉斯加液化天然气（LNG）承购协议。【原文：Japan has confirmed its commitment to an annual $7 billion worth of energy purchases from the United States while exploring their new Alaskan liquefied natural gas (LNG) off-take agreement, a joint statement on the bilateral trade deal showed on Friday.】
